lead_paragraph: Jeremy Crouch scored 20 points to lead Bradley (18-15) to a 70-67 victory over Cincinnati (13-19) in Peoria, Ill., during the opening round of the College Basketball Invitational.
snippet: Jeremy Crouch scored 20 points to lead Bradley (18-15) to a 70-67 victory over Cincinnati (13-19) in Peoria, Ill., during the opening round of the College Basketball Invitational.
